documents.document: RT @BigSportGB: When someone says "it's just a game", show them this... https://t.co/SbxPztgBIB
And that's a big problem, why do we struggle so fucking much to break teams down, it's so disappointing and frustrating.
We have made progress under Klopp and the table suggests that, but the 2 things we haven't sorted out are defending, and breaking teams down
@AnfieldUrchin @James_Cutting Yes it is progress but we should be in a better position now with how we were up until January, it shouldn't be coming down to these last 2
@AnfieldHQ @damo_p76 Yeah that's shocking
We've had the worst collapse ever, we've got players who turn up when they fucking feel like it and we're still top 4, dafuq we manage that
We want this club to be back where it belongs, and with 3 games to go and on the brink of champs league footy and we perform like that.
Obv it pissed me off but it's not necessarily the result today that's got me mad considering what else happened, but it's the performance.
Arsenal win there 4 = 75, Utd win there 3 = 74, we win our 2 = 76, Utd and Arsenal ain't winning all there games though, we can't fuck this.

The only thing we've improved on is the fact we have Klopp, and that's it, now all we need is owners that wanna back him and be successful.
Ask yourself, have we improved as a team in fsgs time here, and in my honest opinion we haven't.
Considering how we started the season, if we don't get top 4 then it's a fucking disaster again, just like last season and the 1 before etc.
We go on a little run win our last 2 then perform like that today, that in itself shows how mentally weak this squad is.
Fsg your time is up, now fuck off and give us owners with some fucking ambition, I've had enough.
The stupid thing is, is that we'll prob still get top 4 due to the fact that Utd have it harder, but then again on today's fucking evidence
